duck: Brevity (comic strip), a comic strip created by Guy Endore-Kaiser and Rodd Perry
brevity code, a vocal word replacement system
Operation Brevity, a World War II battle
brevity definition: shortness of duration; '''especially''' shortness or conciseness of expression.

wiki.text:
'Brevity' is the quality of being brief or concise.

It may also refer to:
* ''Brevity'' (comic strip), a comic strip created by Guy Endore-Kaiser and
  Rodd Perry
* brevity code, a vocal word replacement system
* Operation Brevity, a World War II battle
wiki.title: brevity
